1703777169.itemDescription: You can see everything. You can unsee nothing.

3452625744.itemDescription: An auto-fire weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

2201079123.itemDescription: "Without victory, we cannot go home!" —Primus A'arn

2465295065.bucketDescription: Shotguns, fusion rifles, and sniper rifles.

1498876634.bucketDescription: Auto rifles, pulse rifles, scout rifles, and hand cannons.

368428387.statDescription: Higher Attack allows your weapons to damage higher-level opponents.

2391494160.statDescription: Light increases your level, increasing the damage your abilities deal against higher-level enemies.

4284893193.statDescription: The number of shots per minute this weapon can fire.

4043523819.statDescription: Increases the damage inflicted by each round.

1240592695.statDescription: Increases the effective range of this weapon.

155624089.statDescription: Decreases weapon recoil when fired continuously.

3871231066.statDescription: The number of shots which can be fired before reloading.

4188031367.statDescription: Decreases the time it takes to reload this weapon.

1931675084.statDescription: How much space the weapon occupies in the inventory.

943549884.statDescription: The speed with which the weapon can be readied and aimed.

1345609583.statDescription: The weapon's ability to augment your aim.

2715839340.statDescription: The weapon's tendency to move while firing.

3614673599.statDescription: Increases the explosion radius of this weapon.

2523465841.statDescription: Increases the speed of projectiles fired by this weapon.

3031234337.displayDescription: Increased accuracy, handling and damage resistance when shooting this weapon from behind cover.

972070082.displayDescription: This weapon gains a boost to range and handling when health is low.

3722223157.displayDescription: This weapon becomes more accurate as your health gets lower.

3523239750.displayDescription: This weapon handles and reloads faster when the wielder is the last living player of their Fireteam.

3848963378.displayDescription: Chance to return a portion of the magazine after an assist.

1026458383.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon while critically wounded have a chance to start regenerating health.

1900693659.displayDescription: Quick unassisted kills with this weapon reduce grenade and melee cooldown.

3283108368.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon reduce the cooldown of your grenade.

4023922623.displayDescription: Rapidly landing precision hits will return one round to the magazine.

2421244048.displayDescription: Readying this weapon grants a brief period of bonus accuracy.

2507926095.displayDescription: This weapon gains better target acquisition.

3911170550.displayDescription: Precision kills with this weapon cause the target to explode.

192233393.displayDescription: Increases the reload speed of this weapon when its mag is empty.

4198986151.displayDescription: Precision kills with this weapon dramatically increase reload speed.

824061322.displayDescription: Missing a shot has a chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.

2626112550.displayDescription: It's easier to aim under fire using this weapon.

3877389831.displayDescription: Reduces the severity of this weapon’s recoil.

3661306029.displayDescription: This weapon's magazine will be refilled whenever you unleash your Super.

4266524967.displayDescription: Melee kills while this weapon is equipped have a chance to refill the magazine.

2725595956.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon grant a brief boost to the sprint's top speed.

1632665602.displayDescription: When zoomed, this weapon fires slower, but causes additional damage.

597127202.displayDescription: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range.

3133914358.displayDescription: This weapon grows more accurate the longer it is fired.

2814215427.displayDescription: This weapon has bonus accuracy while firing from the hip.

2450150110.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon grant bonus damage for a short time.

318657130.displayDescription: This weapon gains increased reload and handling when two or more enemies are in close proximity.

3464328064.displayDescription: This weapon gains bonus damage when three or more enemies are in close proximity.

3102938162.displayDescription: This weapon gains improved range and handling for a short time after revival.

770631416.displayDescription: Radar stays active while aiming down this weapon's sights.

3119194123.displayDescription: The bottom half of each magazine causes additional damage.

2859055896.displayDescription: Three rapid kills with this weapon heals a small amount and starts health regeneration

2047535886.displayDescription: Short period of 25% bonus melee damage after landing a hit with this weapon.

1966098145.displayDescription: When stowed for a short time, this weapon is automatically reloaded from your reserves.

2784842908.displayDescription: This launcher's tube can hold three shells.

1928591453.displayDescription: Rockets create cluster bombs when they detonate.

2179933840.displayDescription: Shells fired from this weapon track their targets

steps.nodeStepDescription:
Long-range scope. 
Excellent target acquisition. Improves weapon range.

Short-range scope. 
Quick to aim, with good range.

Low-zoom scope. 
Improved range and handling.
Improved optics, significantly improved handling.

Longest-range scope. 
Heavy optics for pinpoint sniping.

Very long distance scope.
Superb target acquisition and recoil control.

Mid-zoom precision scope. 
Increased range and target acquisition. 
Heavy.
Improved optics, decreased handling, improved range, slightly decreased stability.

Mid-zoom scope. 
Useful for unpredictable situations.

Agile, snappy scope.
Handles beautifully. Rewards a skilled hand.
